name: Putt-Putt® Travels Through Time
description: Mr. Firebird's time machine has gone haywire and Putt-Putt's® best pal Pep, is lost somewhere in time.
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10 Процессор: 1.0 GHz Processor Оперативная память: 512 MB ОЗУ Видеокарта: 100% DirectX compatible graphics Место на диске: 512 MB Звуковая карта: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound
recommended_requirements: Рекомендованные: ОС: Windows 10 Процессор: 1.5 GHz Procesor Оперативная память: 512 MB ОЗУ Видеокарта: 100% DirectX compatible graphics Место на диске: 512 MB Звуковая карта: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound

reviews.review_text: Gave a dinosaur a back massage to rescue my pet dog. 10/10
This game has a very very dark plot its the story of a mutant car traveling through time giving sexual backrubs to dinosaurs I rate 1/10 for kids and 10/10 for adults
I traveled back in time and watched my parents conceive me in putt-putts back seat. I know now why I love putt-putt so much.
This puzzle game is tougher than woodpecker lips bub.
Best game ever 10/10 its the next hitman: blood money.
This is an amazing product. I loved it so much I made a steam group about it. THE PUTT PUTTS.
putt putt si a piece of crap dont play ti ever or you8 will die
Another great classic! the destinations putt putt goes to remind me of the 4 disneyland sections.  Dino age: Adventure land Future: Tomorrow land medieval times: Fantasy land Wild west: Frontier land
Loved the game, brings back great childhood memories.
Started playing this game and it doesnt fit my screen the way it should. im looking for suggestions to fix it.
